amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving retirement security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 425 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 425 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S1969-1970; text: CR S1969) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving retirement security.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 425 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 425 proposed by Senator Collins.
